mapper.select: SELECT distinct * FROM product_detail pd, product p WHERE pd.product_detail_no = #{productDetailNo} and p.product_no = SUBSTR(pd.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO, 1,12)

SELECT d.product_detail_no, d.img1,d.img3, c.CATEGORY_ID, c.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, c.CATEGORY_NAME, c.BRAND, c.NAME, c.PRICE, c.product_no, d.COLOR_CHIP FROM (SELECT a.CATEGORY_ID, a.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, a.CATEGORY_NAME, b.BRAND, b.NAME, b.PRICE, b.product_no FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORY, PRODUCT_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID = PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID) a, PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO AND a.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{value}) c, PRODUCT_DETAIL d WHERE c.product_no = d.product_no AND rownum <= 12
